# Integration Test Specification Template

This template is used to provide the necessary details for creating or updating integration tests for a certificate type. Fill in the sections below with the required information. The agent will use this to generate the integration test code following the workflows in `integration-test-copilot-instructions.instructions.md`.

certificate type: [e.g., FK7804]

version: [e.g., 2.0]

recipient: [e.g., FKASSA]

code: [e.g., LISJP]

test data: [describe sample ElementData, e.g., Element ID, Field ID, Value, Type]

access settings: [list booleans, e.g., canReceiveQuestions: true, nurseCanForward: true, etc.]

test scenarios: [list integration test classes to include, e.g., CreateCertificateIT, SignCertificateIT]

additional information: [any other relevant details or context]
